item.title: CVE-2024-29803|2024-03-27T12:18:14.716Z -- mehanoid.pro -- flatpm
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Mehanoid.Pro FlatPM allows Stored XSS.This issue affects FlatPM: from n/a before 3.1.05.
